newsitem.title: USA: Symbol Technologies acquires LIS Holdings.
newsitem.headline: Symbol Technologies acquires LIS Holdings.

text.p: Symbol Technologies Inc said on Wednesday it has acquired LIS Holdings Ltd, a United Kingdom-based provider of logistics management systems.

Terms of the acquisition include an initial payment of $20.9 million and subsequent payments ranging from zero to a total of $7.8 million, contingent upon LIS achieving 15 percent to 30 percent annual revenue growth over the next three years, Symbol said.
Symbol will take an acquisition-related charge in the current quarter of approximately $13 million pre-tax, or $.30 per share after taxes, it said.
Symbol said LIS will continue to function as a separate business with its current management structure within the company.
LIS, the largest of Symbol's value-added resellers in the United Kingdom, had 1995 revenue of $16 million, primarily in the United Kingdom.
